meanings.definition: A person holding a high position or having great influence.
meanings.sent1: The company's CEO is one of the poobahs in the industry.
meanings.sent2: The poobahs of the organization gathered for an important meeting.
meanings.sent3: The poobahs of the neighborhood decided to host a community event.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a poobahs of the playground, overseeing all the children playing.
meanings.sent5: In the world of fashion, she was considered one of the poobahs, setting trends effortlessly.

meanings.definition: A group of people holding high positions or having great influence.
meanings.sent1: The board of directors is a powerful poobahs in the business world.
meanings.sent2: The political poobahs met to discuss the upcoming election.
meanings.sent3: The poobahs of the book club always choose interesting reads.
meanings.sent4: The elite athletes formed a poobahs, dominating the competition.
meanings.sent5: The poobahs of the music industry collaborated on a groundbreaking project.
